text:
hello, does using the `Update rows in batch in draft table` endpoint create rows if they don't already exist?

I am sending an api request through with the data and a subsequent call to publish, but my HubDB table is still empty.

Checking in the account settings, the body seems to be empty, but if I print it locally it seems fine and using the correct structure.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/cms/hubdb>
Example content of the post request:

this might help:
&property=[contactid] - Used in the request URL for GET /contacts/v1/lists/all/contacts/all
can also export a list of contactId from a HubSpot list

How would I get the most recent date that a deal was moved into a pipeline stage? (See image)

Are webhooks the only way?
